## npm-preview

> `npm-preview` is a workflow template to preview and test packages, including monorepos, from any repo before publishing to NPM.

### Setup

1. Use this template in your repository.
2. Navigate to [`actions > workflows > ci.yml`](../../actions/workflows/ci.yml).
3. Click the <kbd>run workflow</kbd> button.
4. Enter the repository URL you want to preview (e.g., `https://github.com/user/repo`).
